headline: How GE Vernova’s ‘Good Times’ Could Mean Bad Times for Its Stock
summary: Baird analyst Ben Kallo cut his rating on the stock to Hold from Buy. He slashed his price target by $167 to $649 a share.

headline: How the AI data center bubble story is playing out inside one booming energy stock
summary: Can Bloom Energy's high-flying stock, fueled by generating onsite power for AI data centers, steer clear of bubble risks?
